Package de.elo.ix.client.esearch.configpage

Class ESStatusObj

java.lang.Object
de.elo.ix.client.esearch.configpage.ESStatusObj
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ESStatusObj
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Calling checkoutEsStatus returns this object to inform about the current status of connection to Elasticsearch and running processes.
Since:
11.00.000.030
